meta.keywords: cold, cough medicine, Pundra, ayurvedic, cough syrup, Bronchitis
meta.description: Pundra cough syrup is an Ayurvedic medicine for relieving Cough and throat irritation. It is a herbal based syrup that is fortified with Tulsi, Menthol & other powerful scientifically proven herbs.

pageTitle: Ayurvedic Medicine for Cough | Pundra Cough Syrup

productDescription.line1: Pundra Cough Syrup provides effective relief from cough, without any side-effects. Pundra Cough Syrup is an ayurvedic medicine for cough that is fortified with Adhatoda Vasaka, Glycyrrhiza Glabra and other powerful scientifically proven medicinal plants as recommended by Ayurveda.
productDescription.line2: The solution is clinically proven and provides fast relief against acute cough and throat irritation. It is 100% Ayurvedic and safe.
